ratings.comment: he's a great professor! but he has left Math department this summer already, he's back to Europe :(
He is a great teacher who really makes the material interesting and understandable. Plus he is super attractive and has a sexy french accent :)
Great professor, SUPER HOT, sexy accent which is easy to understand. Really knows the material he is teaching and gives really fair exams. Homework graded on completion. Highly recommended.
He is super cute! Has a very good teaching style, does a lot of examples and has very fair exams! Make sure to use the study guide, its reflects whats on the exams perfectly!

I think he is one of the most handsome prof in the department!! French accent is not a big deal. Toughness of exam is still ok if you really put in effort to understand the materials. Any questions you have regarding the material, just go to his office hours! He is really a prof worth taking and I will be taking his other class next semester ;)
Great teacher, knows his stuff, easy to talk to in office hours.  Generally a cool guy.  French accent was no problem.
Great teacher for a great class.  He kept linear algebra fun by giving us the bigger picture.  Also, he grades very fairly although somewhat easier than expected.
He's a great guy and a good teacher, very helpful and his accent isn't bad at all.

Really nice professor, I was worried about the French accent, but it was no problem,he writes everything he says on the board. Beware that the examples in lecture are much easier than those on the exam which were very difficult. If you are having trouble, go see him and he will give you examples very similar to those he will test you on.

Amazing professor! He doesn't present enough proofs in class, but he's always willing to walk you through any proof in office hours. Plus he's really good looking which motivates you to attend class. He really wants you to understand everything and is willing to help you even with concepts in the book beyond the class material. Take him if you can!

A math teacher who actually wants you to understand what he's teaching.  Strange!  However, his tests can be extremely challenging and slightly different from what you've learned in class, so make sure you know the material well.

Florian is a great teacher. Sure, he has a French accent, but he's very nice, and if you don't understand something, just GO TO OFFICE HOURS. He skips over many difficult concepts, so his class ends up being quite easy. HE'S ALSO GORGEOUS and dresses like a hipster.

Great professor! He is an extremely nice person, and very helpful to students. If you don't understand something in lecture (he is usually very clear, but sometimes concepts are difficult) GO to his office hours! He is patient and will help so so much. Overall, fantastic professor

Bertrand is a great guy, and a great teacher. He really cares about students and is very helpfull both in class and at his office hours. Also, if you think that his accent was hard to understand, then I would transfer to a different university, because it's nothing compared to other ones at UW.

He is french, but I understood him fine, for the most part.  Skips over a lot of the more confusing and difficult concepts of calc, which is good if you aren't going further than 221.  Exams aren't that bad but he is pretty uncompromising about giving back points.  Overall I think hes a decent prof and is fine if you aren't going further with math.

His accent makes it really hard to understand what he's teaching.  The lectures are super super boring and pretty unnecessary.  You might have a hard time understanding the materials if youve never taken AP calc because his notes are kind of confusing. He has great sense of style though! Converse and flannel!

very fun prof, incredibly nice (and attractive) - i agree that he is more than willing to help you understand material. for me, it's definitely helpful to read the book for reinforcement but it depends on how comfortable you are with proofs, etc. his french accent is not a problem at all. prbly rate ease and clarity as higher if i read before class

Great professor, clearly underrated and does not deserve to be denigrated because of his French accent. Very cool guy, hilarious, and as others have stated, he will give you all the office hours you need to understand the material. Go out of your way to take his class.
He teaches more French than Math

Amazing teacher. Hard class but he explained things really well. Took a lot of time to help students and is very accessible. You will get a good grade if you do all the homework and go to class everyday.
Terrible professor for a terrible class. Only take choose him if you have a good basic understanding of calc otherwise all the AP yuppies will leave you in the dust.

Fantastic professor. Explains difficult concepts very clearly. Generously gives his time to help his students, and does so patiently. Even willing to help outside his office hours. Gives out exercises that are very helpful for exam preparation. Exams are not difficult as long as you do his exercises and spend time understanding the concepts.
